SEARCH
Package server

Class ClientHandler

java.lang.Object
server.ClientHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClientHandlerInterfaceImpl, ClientHandlerSocket
public abstract class ClientHandler extends Object implements Runnable
A runnable abstract messages client-server handler to be implemented by classes using different connection types
